Diduga Terobos Lampu Merah, Ojol Tertabrak Bus TransJ di Mampang
03 Nov 2019, 17:30 by Wilda Hayatun Nufus
Jakarta - Kecelakaan terjadi di kawasan Mampang Prapatan, Jakarta Selatan. Pengendara sepeda motor tertabrak bus TransJakarta diduga karena melintas saat lampu lalu lintas sudah merah.
Peristiwa itu terjadi di depan restoran cepat saji di Mampang Prapatan, Jakarta Selatan, Minggu (3/11/2019), sekitar pukul 16.58 WIB. Seorang warga bernama Fadhil (25) menyebut pengemudi motor yang terlibat kecelakaan mengenakan perlengkapan driver ojek online.
Si pengemudi motor membawa seorang penumpang. Dia terlihat melintas dari arah Kemang, kemudian berbelok ke kanan ke Jalan Mampang Prapatan yang mengarah ke Ragunan.
Saat berbelok, lampu sudah merah dan bus TransJakarta melintas. Pemotor itu lalu tertabrak.
"Kepala pengemudi mengucurkan darah," kata Fadhil.
Kecelakaan itu menyita perhatian warga. Lalu lintas pun menjadi macet.
Petugas Dishub yang di lapangan menyebut pihak yang tertabrak bus TransJakarta sudah dibawa ke rumah sakit terdekat.

Allegedly Through a Red Light, Ojol was hit by a TransJ Bus in Mampang
03 Nov 2019, 17:30 by Wilda Hayatun Nufus
Jakarta - The accident occurred in the Mampang Prapatan area, South Jakarta. Motorcyclists were hit by a TransJakarta bus allegedly because they passed when the traffic lights were red.
The incident occurred in front of a fast food restaurant in Mampang Prapatan, South Jakarta, Sunday (11/03/2019), around 16.58 WIB. A resident named Fadhil (25) said the motorbike involved in the accident was wearing an online motorcycle taxi driver.
The motor driver is carrying a passenger. He was seen crossing from the direction of Kemang, then turned right onto Jalan Mampang Prapatan which leads to Ragunan.
When turning, the lights are red and the TransJakarta bus passes. The motorbike was then hit.
"The driver's head is bleeding," Fadhil said.
The accident seized the attention of residents. The traffic also becomes jammed.
Dishub officials in the field said the party hit by the TransJakarta bus had been taken to the nearest hospital.
